Description: Blue glazed composition shabti with black painted detail(faded): a striated lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs(illegible); the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
